meanings.definition: A person who creates or designs in a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The talented stylers at the fashion show showcased their unique designs.
meanings.sent2: The stylists and stylers worked together to create stunning looks for the models.
meanings.sent3: The group of stylers decided to have a design competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was a true styler, painting the canvas of life with her creativity.
meanings.sent5: The stylers' creations left a lasting impression on everyone who saw them.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to create a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The hair stylers in the salon helped achieve the perfect curls.
meanings.sent2: She used the stylers to curl her hair before the party.
meanings.sent3: The stylers in the beauty kit were essential for creating different looks.
meanings.sent4: The stylers transformed her hair from straight to curly in minutes.
meanings.sent5: With the help of the stylers, she could change her hairstyle easily.

meanings.definition: A product used to shape or hold a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The hair gel acted as the perfect stylers for his spiky hair.
meanings.sent2: She applied the stylers to keep her hairstyle intact all day.
meanings.sent3: The stylers in the bottle promised to keep her hair in place.
meanings.sent4: The stylers provided the finishing touch to her elegant updo.
meanings.sent5: Using the stylers, she achieved the desired look for the event.
